.. _configuration:

===============
 Configuration
===============

If you find yourself in the situation when default configuration is no longer
valid for you and you need to change something there, you have found a correct
document. This is a reference to all current configuration settings.

Feel free to copy this source code into your _config.yml file and modify.

   :language: yaml
   :linenos:
